mapper.sql: examination_application_id, applicant_id, application_type, application_path, apply_time, status, occupation, application_level, fullname, gender, identity_type, identity_no, approval_opinion, approval_time
mapper.insert: insert into examination_application(examination_application_id, applicant_id, application_type, application_path, apply_time, status, occupation, application_level, fullname, gender, identity_type, identity_no, approval_opinion, approval_time) values(#{examinationApplicationId}, #{applicantId}, #{applicationType}, #{applicationPath}, #{applyTime}, #{status}, #{occupation}, #{applicationLevel}, #{fullname}, #{gender}, #{identityType}, #{identityNo}, #{approvalOpinion}, #{approvalTime})
mapper.update:
update examination_application
examination_application_id = #{examinationApplicationId},
applicant_id = #{applicantId},
application_type = #{applicationType},
application_path = #{applicationPath},
apply_time = #{applyTime},
status = #{status},
occupation = #{occupation},
application_level = #{applicationLevel},
fullname = #{fullname},
gender = #{gender},
identity_type = #{identityType},
identity_no = #{identityNo},
approval_opinion = #{approvalOpinion},
approval_time = #{approvalTime},
where examination_application_id = #{examinationApplicationId}
